title: Chaostheorie
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Catering, European
description: Vegan cafe and cocktail bar, est. Aug 2013 originally at Lychener Strasse 4 and moved to this bigger space in 2016. Offers daily breakfast plus sandwiches, filled toast and croissant (ham and cheese, hot dog style, hawaii, chocolate), nachos, gluten-free cakes. Monday evening special is bbq burger; Tuesday evening quesadillas; Thursday evening döner kebap; Saturday morning Bavarian white sausage. Drinks lists include coffee, tea, shakes, cocktails with or without alcohol, beer and wine.
